flashcards.title: DMV California Practice Flashcards - Set 2
flashcards.description: 15 essential DMV questions covering right-of-way, safety, and road rules for California driving test

cards.question: Who has the right-of-way at an intersection with no crosswalks?
If you approach a curve or the top of a hill and you do not have a clear view of the road ahead, you should:
cards.answer: slow down so you can stop if necessary

cards.question: Whose responsibility is it to know how your medications affect your driving?
Which of the following is true about safety belts and collisions?
cards.answer: they increase your chances of survival in most types of collisions

cards.question: If you are unable to see the road ahead while driving because of heavy fog and your wipers do not help, you should:
cards.answer: pull off the road completely until visibility improves

cards.question: This red and white sign means:
cards.answer: you may not enter the road from your direction

cards.question: You are required to wear your safety belt in a moving vehicle:
cards.answer: and failure to do so will result in a traffic ticket

cards.question: You are crossing an intersection and an emergency vehicle is approaching with a siren and flashing lights. You should:
cards.answer: pull to the right in the intersection and stop

cards.question: You are on a two-way road and the vehicle ahead of you is turning left into a driveway. You may legally pass on the right:
cards.answer: if there is enough road between the curb and the vehicle

cards.question: If you have a green light, but traffic is blocking the intersection:
cards.answer: stay out of the intersection and wait until traffic clears

cards.question: This white sign means:
cards.answer: look, listen, and prepare to stop at the crossing, if necessary

cards.question: Which statement is true about motorcyclists and motorists?
cards.answer: motorcyclists have the same rights/responsibilities as other motorists

cards.question: When you change or merge with another lane, you:
cards.answer: need at least a 4-second gap in traffic

cards.question: Your wheels should be pointed straight ahead, unless you are:
cards.answer: parked on a hill or sloping driveway

cards.question: You are driving in the far right lane of a four-lane freeway and notice thick broken white lines on the left side of your lane. You are driving in:
